channel.title: Products on Halal Food Guide from Authentic Scholars
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Halal Food Guide from Authentic Scholars

item.title: Dempster Bread
item.description: This is from Dempster’s bread. Does not seem to have any concerning ingredients. Mufti Faisal Al-Mahmudi

item.title: Rennet
item.description: If you look at the ingredients of whatever you are purchasing, it should say “Microbial enzymes” or something along those lines. This is referring to rennet derived from microbes which is fine. If it just says Rennet then it’s doubtful and should be investigated. Brother Zaki Ilmhub For a detailed information on Rennet by Mufti Faisal Al-Mahmoudi. click link
